title: What’s the Biggest Comeback Story in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
itunes:title: What’s the Biggest Comeback Story in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
description:
Phil Zanghi joins us on The After Show. We talk about comebacks in the cigar industry. Who seemed like they were out of the cigar business and came back in a major way?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
